Uses of Package
com.nandox.jop.core.processor.attribute

  • Packages that use com.nandox.jop.core.processor.attribute 
    Package Description
    com.nandox.jop.core.processor.attribute  
  • Classes in com.nandox.jop.core.processor.attribute used by com.nandox.jop.core.processor.attribute 
    Class and Description
    AbstractJopAttribute
    Jop Attribute abstract implementation
    JopAttribute
    Attribute of page block.
    Use this interface to implement every jop attribute with preRender and postRender action on rendering of page block,
    every action can return an RETURN_ACTION to pilot the rest of rendering.
    There is also a subclass Factory to instance an attribute.

    To implement an attribute have to create a Class that implements JopAttribute and extend AbstractJopAttribute.
    !!IMPORTANT!! on the class define annotation JopCoreAttribute with attribute name without prefix (jop_)
    JopAttribute.Response
    Response class of an attribute
    JopAttribute.RETURN_ACTION
    Return action on block render phase
    JopCoreAttribute
    Annotation to declare an Jop attribute.
    Properties:
    name to give attribute nae
    priority (optional) to give a attribute execute priority (execute before attribute with low number priority)
    nested (optional) to add a more attributes (comma separated) to the same class that are nested to the main attribute
